Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Commandant, watching your whole fragile act is downright painful.', 4: '1'}
{2: "(Fragile by Noctis' standards, I suppose.)", 3: '7'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Hey, you can't crush enemies on the battlefield if you're built like a twig!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "If you slow me down because of this, you're in for a world of trouble.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "And don't expect me to drag you off the battlefield. Giving you a flare gun is already being generous.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Not too shabby, but still needs a little oomph!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis cracks up and heads for the sports shop.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "What are you zoning out for? Let's hit up the sports shop for some workout gear.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory204.png'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "This is my first time here. It's tucked away in this quiet neighborhood, guess the owner's a real character.", 4: '1'}
{2: '(Could this place be sketchy?)', 3: '25'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hey, boss! Hook me up with a couple of those detachable dumbbell sets!', 4: '1'}
{3: "From the back of the shop lumbers a clunky mechanoid, moving at a snail's pace."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "So the owner's not human, huh?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "Watch your words, it's just a robot I control remotely.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: 'Dumbbell sets are right up front on the rack. You look buff enough. Go grab them yourself.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis tries hoisting a dumbbell, his face scrunching up in confusion.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Something isn't right. Feels too easy. Are you sure these dumbbells are legit?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "Would I ever pawn off fakes on you? Geez, all those reps making you dull? Can't even spot a fake, huh?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis grips the iron balls at the ends of the dumbbell and rips off the metal casing, revealing...'}
{3: 'Wooden junk pretending to be legit, hiding under a flimsy iron cover.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "So you just slapped on some iron, huh? Still claiming it's not fake, you sneaky bot!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mechanoid', 3: "You brawny goon... I-I don't care! You destroyed my product, cough up now!", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The mechanoid shoots out its mechanical arms, charging at Noctis full throttle.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What? This too? Playing the victim and pinning the blame on me, huh?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Noctis, with a quick jab, twists the mechanoid's head a full 180."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Don't just come at me out of nowhere, you creep! Gave me a scare. You're really asking for a pounding here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Alright, alright, warm-up's over.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Whoa... opponent down already? That was too easy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Can't believe I found a rigged shop in broad daylight. Where do I even start complaining about this mess?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I guess I'll take it up with the Constellia Management Committee.", 3: '71'}
{3: 'The mechanoid, stuck on the ground, lets out a weak groan...'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "See, Commandant? Skip the workouts and you're ripe for getting blindsided by jerks like that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Might as well drag you to the gym. Still got a few months left on my membership.', 4: '1'}
